feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:14 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 10:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -24.1°C
Wind: N 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Fog dissipating this afternoon then mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
